data.text: @HonourableHloni If government can't allow its employees to access a certain percentage of their pension money then this ruling is a final nail in ANC's coffin
@HonourableHloni But Covid came with its own borrowed monies. They did not use our money.
@HonourableHloni But they're increasing everything around us except our salaries. This government though 😧
@HonourableHloni But the State spent plus R1.2billion on a state capture commission that only scratched the surface of the capture, fraud and corruption scourge.
@HonourableHloni Am confused... Do they have any evidence about financial status of the country for them to come into such conclusion?

@HonourableHloni ConCourt has gone into policy issues now. It can't speak of prioritization of resources. That's for another arm of the state. The issue was whether the agreement was enforceable in the wake of unaffordablity & was signed despite its reps knowing that it was unaffordable. Ethics
@HonourableHloni And there was no Covid-19 in 2018.Zondo desperately want that CJ position
@HonourableHloni It's a serious sign of a lawless country.
